main event: A farmer observed a circular UFO approximately 60 feet in diameter near his home in SE Ohio on the night of June 24, 1959.
interesting points: The object hovered silently for about 10 minutes before suddenly accelerating away,The farmer observed the object at around 2300 hrs,The sighting was described as occurring about 300 feet from the witness,The objects in the earlier observation were traveling at an estimated speed of 500 m.p.h., Conclusions drawn included the possibility of the objects being high altitude balloons or aircraft.
sighted object: a circular UFO approximately 60 feet in diameter
witness description: a farmer who reported the sighting
